meanings.definition: A person who establishes a trust or settles property.
meanings.sent1: The settlors created a trust to protect their assets.
meanings.sent2: The settlors transferred ownership of the property to the trust.
meanings.sent3: The settlors decided to play a game where they pretended to be trust creators.
meanings.sent4: The settlors were like architects, carefully designing the structure of the trust.
meanings.sent5: The settlors were like gardeners, nurturing the growth of their financial security.
